TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if TriggerObject() ~= nil then TriggerObject():ComesIntoPlayTapped() end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to target creature or player.
Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to target creature or player.

Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to target creature or player.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetZone(ZONE_IN_PLAY) filter:AddSubType(LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:SetCardInstance(TriggerObject()) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) total = filter:CountStopAt( 5 ) if total == 5 then EffectDC():Set_CardPtr(1, TriggerObject()) return (TriggerObject():GetSubType():Test( LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN ) ~= 0 and TriggerObject():GetPlayer() == EffectController()) else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:May() filter:AIMay() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_CARDS + FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local total = 0 local land = EffectDC():Get_CardPtr(1) local target_creature = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) local filter = Object():GetFilter() local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetZone(ZONE_IN_PLAY) filter:AddSubType(LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:SetCardInstance(land) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) total = filter:CountStopAt( 5 ) if total == 5 then if ( target_creature ~= nil ) then target_creature:DealDamage(3, source) elseif ( target_player ~= nil ) then target_player:DealDamage(3, source) end end
